snippet.title: Project Absentia Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Waffle Iron Studios joins Hellforge Studios, and to celebrate we have a new trailer to announce we're going into Early Access Soon™

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662010/Project_Absentia/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/WaffleIronCoop
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/WaffleIronStudios
